name: Susan Martin
text:
We ate at pizza hut in crossville as we were travelling home.
Food was awesome, and service was excellent.
A pleasant experience.

text: The pizza is not bake or something was wrong. Normally when I order light red sauce  it have some on it. This time it seems to have none.  The topping seem light also.  The over taste and looks was well below what Pizza Hut pizza looks and taste light.

The employees were very helpful!
